title: 686: TOP CRYPTO ANALYST PREDICTS ‘$180K MASSIVE BITCOIN SURGE’, SAYS BTC IS TRAPPING SELLERS!!
description:
Widely followed Bitcoin analyst Pentoshi is predicting a wild Bitcoin rally, says BTC now primed to print a massive green daily candle.

As for his bull cycle target for Bitcoin, Pentoshi believes that BTC could rally to as high as $180K, marking a 250% upside potential from its current value of around $51,000. “Vertical accumulation innit ‘colorized’ 2012-2021.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
